subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tom Glavine is struggling after 21 exceptional major leauge seasons and The Mets, who have lost 14 of their last 18 games, are in a free fall that is threatening to redefine their season.
snippet: Tom Glavine is struggling after 21 exceptional major leauge seasons and The Mets, who have lost 14 of their last 18 games, are in a free fall that is threatening to redefine their season.
